description: Collaborated in a cross-functional team of 5 to design and build a software product from the ground up, following the company's established development pipeline.
Developed and optimized core system architecture and features with C# (Unity), ensuring scalability, maintainability, and cross-platform reliability.
Designed and integrated user interfaces with backend logic, improving usability and workflow efficiency during testing.
Delivered project milestones on time by coordinating tasks with teammates, contributing to the successful release of a fully functional prototype.
Maintained and enhanced 3+ internal web portals accessed by students and staff across the organization, contributing to smooth and consistent digital experiences, using C# / ASP.NET.
Collaborated in a 4-person sub-team within a larger 10-person engineering group to refactor legacy code, resolve bugs, and introduce new UI features that improved usability.
Proactively identified and fixed recurring issues, reducing error reports and improving platform stability.
Implemented feature upgrades aligned with user feedback and frontend best practices, supporting evolving academic and administrative workflows.
